```{r}
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)

gamble <- function(initial_amount, goal_amount, p_win) {
  money <- initial_amount
  steps <- 0
  
  while(money > 0 & money < goal_amount){
    money <- money + ifelse(runif(1) < p_win, 1, -1)
    steps <- steps + 1
  }
  
  return(ifelse(money <= 0, "Bankrupt", "Win"))
}
```

```{r}
gamble(10, 20, 0.5)
```
